name: SQUARE FIGHTER (itch)
description:
SQUARE FIGHTER - tiny local-multiplayer twitch shooter for two players

***REQUIRES EITHER XBOX OR PS4 CONTROLLERS, may work with other twin-stick controllers***

A tiny local multiplayer game created for Britt Brady and Cullen Dwyer's birthday event at Game Pub in Eugene, OR on Jan. 6th 2018.

Made on various flights (first few hours of dev) and wrapped up at home in a few more hours. Improvements will probably come someday - feel free to report issues to pixelfootgames@gmail.com.

Thanks for playing!

Controls: 

Twin Sticks - Left to move, Right to aim

Right shoulder to shoot

Powerup in center of level gives you 5 grenades. 

Press R on keyboard to restart whole game.

Escape to quit application.
